comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Patson Daka plays a lovely pass into the box and finds Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester). He tries his luck from close range and coolly strikes the ball into the back of the net. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Fantastic team goal! Moises Caicedo (Brighton) was set free in the area by Enock Mwepu and made no mistake with a lovely finish into the left side of the net. 2:1.

comments.comments_text: Stunning strike! Patson Daka (Leicester) latches on to a precise through ball from Youri Tielemans before unleashing an unstoppable shot into the back of the net from the edge of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is now 2:2.
